summary: Build a professional affiliate + review website for online gaming/casinos (similar to psafebet8.com) with a high-performance Next.js front-end, Node/Express API, database (PostgreSQL or MongoDB), and a robust admin panel for CMS, moderation, analytics, and affiliate click tracking.
architectural_notes: Suggested stack: Next.js frontend with Node.js/Express backend and PostgreSQL or MongoDB database.
Use SSR for content-heavy pages (reviews/news) for SEO.
Promo code countdown timers can be implemented client-side with setInterval (no constant refresh).
Database should support affiliate click-count tracking per referral link.
Default UI theme: dark mode with vibrant gold/yellow CTAs; mobile-first responsive grid.
known_issues: Deployment failed (deployment error encountered); user requested a retry build/deploy with updated website name.

existing_features.title: Add public homepage UI with a clean, grid-based layout showing 'Recommended' listings, including: Play CTA button, star rating display, and 'Hot' label where applicable; make it mobile-first and performant.
Create public listing pages and navigation for: Casinos, Bonuses, News, and Complaints, including: browse lists, view detail pages (where applicable), and category-appropriate sorting.
Implement promo code system on the public site: promo code listings with 'Click to Copy' behavior and a live countdown timer to expiry (client-side interval-based).
Implement review detail pages for each casino/game listing including: expert rating, pros/cons sections, and user reviews (list + submit).
Add global search and filtering across listings, supporting search by text and filters/sorts by category, rating, and newest additions.
Implement Complaints: public submission form and backend workflow; allow users to submit complaints, and display only approved complaints publicly.
Create an Admin area with secure login using Internet Identity and role-based access control for admin-only operations.

Build Admin Dashboard that shows overview metrics: total listings, total promo codes, total articles, total complaints (by status), and referral click analytics (top-performing partners/listings by click count).

Implement Admin CMS with full CRUD for: (1) Casino/Game listings (title, image, referral link, rating, description, category, recommended/hot flags), (2) Promo codes (code, link, expiry), (3) News/Blog articles (title, body, publish date, tags).
Implement complaint moderation tools in Admin: list pending complaints, approve/reject, and add a reply that becomes visible on the complaint detail page (if approved).
Track affiliate referral clicks: route outbound 'Play' clicks through a click-tracking action that increments count before redirecting to the referral URL.

Add SEO-focused metadata support for listing detail pages and news article pages (titles, descriptions, and social sharing meta tags) to improve indexability within the constraints of a client-rendered React app.
Add a legal compliance footer across the public site containing: Disclaimer, Terms of Service, and prominent '18+' gambling awareness labeling.
Apply a consistent visual theme: dark mode by default with vibrant gold/yellow accent color for CTAs, modern typography, and a cohesive component style across public site and admin.

Generate and include initial app scaffolding deliverables in-repo: clear project structure documentation and an implemented starter Homepage and Admin Dashboard screen wired to real backend methods (even if seeded with sample data).

Add generated static image assets to the frontend and render them in the UI (logo in header, placeholder thumbnails for listing cards, and an 18+ badge in the footer) from frontend/public/assets/generated without routing images through the backend.
Set the website/app name to "Yono Store" across the frontend UI wherever the product name is displayed (e.g., header/brand label, home page hero/title if present, admin area header).
Set default HTML document metadata to use "Yono Store" (at minimum: document title) so browser tabs and shared previews use the updated site name where applicable.
Update any in-repo user-facing documentation or on-screen onboarding/help text (if present) to refer to the website as "Yono Store".

new_feature_requests.summary: Homepage with grid-based 'Recommended' listings including Play buttons, star ratings, and Hot labels (dark theme, mobile-first).
Public listing pages for Casinos, Bonuses, News, and a Complaints section (read + submit complaints).
Promo code system: display promo codes with click-to-copy and live countdown timer for expiry.
Review system: detail pages for games/casinos with expert rating, pros/cons, and user reviews.
Global search and filtering (by category, rating, newest).
Admin dashboard with traffic overview and total listings.
Admin CMS with full CRUD for listings, promo codes, and news/blog articles.
Complaint moderation in admin: review, approve, and reply to user-submitted complaints.
Affiliate management: track and display click counts per referral link in admin analytics.
SEO optimization using SSR for review and news pages.
Legal compliance footer: Disclaimer, Terms of Service, and 18+ gambling awareness labels.
Provide initial deliverables: project structure, database schema, and starter code for Homepage + Admin Dashboard.
Implement backend data models and stable storage for: Listings (casino/game), Promo Codes, News/Blog Articles, Complaints, User Reviews, and Referral Click tracking (click counts per referral link).
